member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase
member.summary: Base class for all transition classes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a TransitionBase class with the specified parameters.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.Begin
member.summary: Apply a transition to its TargetObject.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.End
member.summary: Stops a transition.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.OnOutBrushChanged(RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs<DrawingBrush>)
member.summary: Raises the OutBrushChanged event.
member.param: A RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.Completed
member.summary: Add/Remove the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.OutBrushChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the value of the OutBrush property changes.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.AccelerationRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the AccelerationRatio for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.AutoReverse
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse for the internal 'Storyboard object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.BeginTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.DecelerationRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the filled brush to be used to generate the animated OutBrush brush. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The brush to be used when applying a transition to a framework element.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.FillBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.Grain
member.summary: Gets or sets the Graining size. This is the smallest unit to be updated when applying a transition.
member.value: Specifies the graining size. The smallest value is 5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.OutBrush
member.summary: Gets an animated brush created from the Fill and Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransition.Push if the tranisition type is PushTransition to be used to fill any element. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The animated brush to be used when applying a transition to a framework element.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.RepeatBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.SpeedRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio for the internal 'Storyboard' object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.TargetObject
member.summary: Gets or set a framework element to apply a transition to it. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The brush for the shadow for the frame that you add to the ImageViewer or RasterImageViewer control.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.AccelerationRatioProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AccelerationRatio dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the AutoReverse dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the DecelerationRatio dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Duration dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the FillBehavior dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Fill dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Grain dependency property.
